# bmbstats: Bootstrap Magnitude-base Statistics

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `bmbstats` is to provide a set of analysis and visualization functions for common sports science problems and tasks. `bmbstats` provides confidence intervals of the estimators using bootstrap inference method implemented in the `boot` package. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of bmbstats from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("bmbstats")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mladenjovanovic/bmbstats")
```

## Examples and documentation

Extensive documentation and examples can be found in [Bootstrap Magnitude-based Statistics for Sports Scientists](https://mladenjovanovic.github.io/bmbstats-book/) book.
